title: Plane skids off the runway during take off in Nepal
text:
Plane skids off the runway during take off in Nepal 3:21pm IST - 00:45 
All passengers and crew were safely evacuated after a Malindo Air flight skidded off the runway as it prepared to take off from Kathmandu. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
